page.title: 13CHAPEL EVERY SUNDAY
page.content: I go to this chapel every Sunday at 2.30pm,for Sunday School.Mr Gard is our minister.About 25 children attend the chapel and there are 21 adults on the membership. This is a community Chapel.All the Christenings and Funeral services for Blaendare are done here.It is a wood and zinc building about 50years old. All the heaters were stolen from the chapel but in two weeks,enough money had been collected to buy more and enough left over for moving the entrance door from the road and putting it on the side for safety.
